system_requirements: Requires Windows 10/11 (Pro or higher), 4GB RAM, .NET Framework 4.8

release_notes.description: Introduced a new non-blocking, automatic update checker to keep users on the latest version.
Added a 'Group Policy' section to apply optimized system policies for privacy and performance.
Re-architected the `CleanCacheFrame` to use a high-performance PowerShell-based size calculation engine for 100% accuracy.
Upgraded all hover sound effects to a stateful protocol to prevent auditory spam.
Resolved a startup race condition in `AnimatedTweakCard` by implementing a centralized state injection protocol.
Corrected a visual layout bug in the `NavigationRail` that caused it to resize when the content frame's scrollbar appeared.
